name: No Leg Jack
description:
'No Leg Jack' is a game about a veteran soldier, called to arms once more.

He once fought in 'The Great War' as a brave man. Sadly enough when he returned home he fell down the stairs and broke his legs. Amputation was the only option.

But THIS does NOT stop 'No Leg Jack' from kickin ass!

Use your guns recoil to fly through the levels like a killing machine!
